app_name: Groups Control Groups Streaming Apps MONOMAX
app_description: MONOMAX The only application that provides all entertainment for families with premium series movies and sports from all over the world for more than 20 000 hours. Enjoy worldwide series: Chinese series Korean series Western series Indian series and Thai series Enjoy blockbuster and unique movies: Chinese movies Hollywood movies Korean movies Thai movies and Indian movies in action adventure Sci fi Fantasy horror and comedy Offer cartoons and animation for children Watch sports content as if you were in the games One account could be used simultaneously up to 3 devices Ads free experiences High resolution: Full HD Provide both Thai dubbing and soundtrack Devices Smartphone Tablet PC Laptop Smart TV Others Your payment will be processed through your iTunes account when you purchase the package. If you do not wish to continue the automatic renewal you could cancel the renewal at least 24 hours before the expiry date. You could manage your payment by activating deactivating the automatic renewal system in the account settings menu after you purchase the packages. If you deactivate the automatic renewal system the payment cannot be processed and you will not be able to watch movies and series in Monomax if the payment has not been successful. After the cancellation you could still watch movies and series until the expiry date. The system needs 2 3 days to process after purchase. The free trial will be canceled when you already purchased the packages.
